title: The Past, Present, and Future of NAFTA
description:
Can Nafta — and the relationship between the U.S. and Canada — be salvaged before a Friday deadline? David Meyers speaks with Josh Wingrove from the Ottawa bureau of Bloomberg News about the fallout between Trump and Trudeau.
FOLLOW UP
Josh's latest: Canadian Unity on NAFTA Cracks in Latest Trudeau-Trump Showdown.
You can follow Josh at @josh_wingrove. 
----
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
